page.title: 18PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: In our area there are three pubs{The {Castle,The Five Bells and The Admiral {Nelson.}They are all {Batemans pubs. {Batemans beer }is brewed in{Wainfleet. {Wainfleet}is near Skegness and 15 miles from{Boston.Batemans bitter {costs 64p a pint,half a lager costs {40p and mild costs 58p a pint. {The Castle }has a beer garden for playing in and has seats outside for sitting on.It also has a boat to play and climb on.It is run by{Mr.G.Cripsey {and his son Asa goes to our school. {The Castle}has more trade in the summer because of all the traffic going to Skegness,which is a sea-side resort. The pubs have food now to sell at lunch times and tea time.
